text: Aap kahiye kay woh kaun hai jo tum ko aasman aur zamin say rizq phonchata hai ya woh kaun hai jo kanon aur aankhon per poora ikhtiyar rakhta hai aur woh kaun hai jo zinda ko murda say nikalta hai aur murda ko zinda say nikalta hai aur woh kaun hai jo tamam kaamon ki tadbeeren kerta hai? Zaroor woh yehi kahen gay kay “Allah” to unn say kahiye phir kiyon nahi dartay
